extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.4.3:[/B] - Fixed the series and episode search.
[B]0.4.2:[/B] - Added a [B]Tools[/B] category to the settings. Each tool brings up a confirmation dialog explaining how they work, so you can read before using. - Tools added: Restore Watched Episodes, Update Favourites. - Minor fix to movie titles.
[B]0.4.1:[/B] - Changed to a WatchCartoonOnline domain that's updated more frequently. - Fix for letters in episode numbers (when using the "Clean Episode Titles" option).
[B]0.4.0:[/B] - Fix for when there's weird season ordinals in the episode titles.
[B]0.3.9:[/B] - Fix for when there's blank lists on the mobile website.
[B]0.3.8:[/B] - Fix for when using favorite items with the old website address.
[B]0.3.7:[/B] - Fixed thumbnail images with the Show Information context menu.
